Title: Peace of Mind
Plot: The Drew Thompson case becomes a fiasco that Raylan can fix only by besting Boyd in a hunt for the unwitting woman caught in the middle.
GuestStars: Jim Beaver, Ron Eldard, Daniel Buran, Rick Gomez, John Kapelos, Jesse Luken, David Meunier, Abby Miller, Mike O'Malley, Lindsay Pulsipher, Mykelti Williamson, Natalie Zea, Mel Fair, William Gregory Lee
